comment: This is a rectangular text box containing Chinese characters in seal script (篆书) with accompanying small annotations in regular script (楷书). The characters are arranged vertically in columns, typical of traditional Chinese printing. The box has a thick black border and appears to be part of a printed classical dictionary or lexicon, possibly from a work like the *Shuowen Jiezi* or similar. On the left margin, there are additional vertical labels such as '大艸' and '唐文', indicating sections or editions.
